name: io.github.zenml-io/mcp-zenml
description: MCP server for ZenML - browse stacks, pipelines, runs, artifacts & trigger pipeline runs via API

environmentVariables.description: Base URL of your ZenML server (e.g., https://<workspace-id>-zenml.cloudinfra.zenml.io).
environmentVariables.name: ZENML_STORE_URL

environmentVariables.description: API key used to authenticate with your ZenML server (ideally a service account key).
environmentVariables.name: ZENML_STORE_API_KEY
